main event: An airline captain observed a silver circular object for 2 minutes while airborne.
interesting points: The object was larger than a basketball and shaped like a half-circle., The object had a silver reflection in the sky., It disappeared as soon as the sun came up., The sighting was made at 7,222 feet while on a heading of 330 degrees., The conclusion categorized the object as possibly a balloon, aircraft, astronomical, or unknown.
